The others are Tomamu, Sahoro and Kiroro Peak Skiing Carve your own path through Kiroro’s legendary powder, celebrated for being some of the lightest and freshest snow in Hokkaido. With abundant snowfall and long ski seasons, every day promises new tracks and endless adventure. Feel the rush as you glide down perfectly groomed slopes framed by snow-covered forests, or venture off-piste into untouched backcountry terrain for the ultimate freeride experience. Kiroro’s unique microclimate ensures consistent, fluffy powder—ideal for skiers and snowboarders of all levels. Beginners can build confidence on gentle runs with the support of expert Club Med instructors, while seasoned riders can challenge themselves on advanced trails or test their skills through deep powder glades. Between runs, soak in panoramic mountain views and the serenity of nature that makes Kiroro truly special. After a day on the slopes, return to the warmth of the resort for a well-earned après-ski moment — a hot drink in hand, stories shared, and the promise of another perfect ski day ahead.
